plays.text: Penalty to Michal Grosek 2 minutes for Boarding Donald Brashear
Goal scored by Justin Williams assisted by Marty Murray
Penalty to Billy Tibbetts 2 minutes for High Sticking Rem Murray
Penalty to Bryan Berard 2 minutes for Interference Donald Brashear
Penalty to Ruslan Fedotenko 2 minutes for Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)

Goal scored by Eric Desjardins assisted by Simon Gagne and Keith Primeau
Goal scored by Pavel Bure assisted by Matthew Barnaby and Eric Lindros
Penalty to Donald Brashear 2 minutes for Hooking Andreas Johansson
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by John LeClair
Goal scored by John LeClair unassisted
Goal scored by John LeClair assisted by Mark Recchi and Adam Oates
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for Crosschecking Brian Leetch
Penalty to Brian Leetch 2 minutes for Crosschecking Keith Primeau
Penalty to Theo Fleury 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Simon Gagne
Penalty to Simon Gagne 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Theo Fleury
Goal scored by Eric Lindros assisted by Brian Leetch
Penalty to Justin Williams 2 minutes for Roughing Petr Nedved
Penalty to Petr Nedved 2 minutes for Roughing Justin Williams
Goal scored by Keith Primeau unassisted
